name: Modern
description: A sleek and sophisticated style with clean lines, neutral tones, and minimal decor.

name: Traditional
description: Classic design elements with rich textures, warm colors, and ornate furnishings.

name: Minimalist
description: A simple and uncluttered space with neutral colors and functional furnishings.

name: Bohemian
description: A relaxed and vibrant space filled with eclectic patterns, textures, and plants.

name: Scandinavian
description: A cozy and bright space featuring natural materials, white walls, and minimal decor.

name: Industrial
description: Raw and unfinished materials like exposed brick, metal, and wood create an edgy look.

name: Farmhouse
description: A warm and inviting style featuring rustic elements, wooden furniture, and soft linens.

name: Rustic
description: A cozy and earthy space with natural materials, distressed wood, and neutral tones.

name: Mid-Century Modern
description: Inspired by the 1950s with retro furniture, bold colors, and organic shapes.

name: Eclectic
description: A unique and personal space that mixes different styles, colors, and textures.

name: Luxury
description: A high-end bedroom with premium materials, plush fabrics, and opulent decor.

name: Transitional
description: A balanced blend of traditional and modern elements for a timeless bedroom look.
